JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW FRIDAY, THE O4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 14TH POUSHA, 1940 Crl.MC.No. 38 of 2019 CRIME NO. 843/2018 OF PAVARATTY POLICE STATION, THRISSUR PETITIONER/S: 1 SANDHOSH K.V., AGED 40 YEARS s/o. BASKARA KURUP, KALARTIKYAL HOUSE, BRAHMMAKULAM, GURUVAYOOR, THRISSUR-680104. 2 YOUSAF ALI, AGED 45 YEARS s/o. UMMER, NALAKATH HOUSE, BRAHMMAKULAM, GURUVAYOOR, THRISSUR-680104. BY ADV. SRI.E.A.HARIS RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA THROUGH SUB INSPECTOR, PAVARATTY POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM. 2 ABDHUL HYSHAM, s/o. ABDHUL HAMEED, AGED 20 YEARS, PULICHARAM HOUSE, PAVARATTY KARA, CHAVAKAD, THRISSUR. 3 AJAMAL s/o. ASHARAF, AGED 23 YEARS, MUDAVATHAYIL HOUSE, CHAKKAMKANDAM P.O., CHAVAKAD, THRISSUR. 2019/KER/198 Crl.MC.No. 38 of 2019 1i2.. BY ADV. SHRI.AFSAL KHAN H. OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. The petitioners are the accused in Crime No. 843 of 2018 of Pavaratty Police Station registered for the offences under Sections 323, 324 & 341 of the Indian Penal Code. Respondents 2 & 3 are the victims. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the criminal case may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and respondents 2 & 3 and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavits filed by 2019/KER/198 Crl.MC.No. 38 of 2019 1.3.. respondents 2 & 3, who have entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the allegation of settlement is true and no public interest is involved. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No. 843 of 2018 of Pavaratty Police Station are quashed. The learned magistrate may pass appropriate orders for the disposal of the material objects, if any, produced in the case. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE Bka/07.01.2019 Bupa 2 ae a Fe = pa BE 2019/KER/198 Crl.MC.No. 38 of 2019 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE-A1 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.843/2018 OF PAVARATHY POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE-A4 AFFIDAVIT OF THE DEFACTO COMPLAINANT / 2ND RESPONDENT.
